subject: Athletics and Sports
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Rutgers Coach Greg Schiano’s advertising blitz in South Florida paid off with 21 football players from the Sunshine State who are helping the New Jersey school make history.
snippet: Rutgers Coach Greg Schiano’s advertising blitz in South Florida paid off with 21 football players from the Sunshine State who are helping the New Jersey school make history.
